analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/19/0x75e3f62bf58a615d9bb3b599456d1b4b2e4c27a5.sol:
	Contract Contract has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/19/0x75e3f62bf58a615d9bb3b599456d1b4b2e4c27a5.sol#97-98)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/19/0x75e3f62bf58a615d9bb3b599456d1b4b2e4c27a5.sol:
